original_title: กลิ่นสีและกาวแป้ง 2
overview: The story of art students. Since they entered university as a freshmen until they graduate until they graduate,their lives have created so much stories. The variety of their works create value of their thoughts and imagination, enough to get attractions from others. After their graduate, each of them found their purpose of living and living their own life in the way that they meant to be.
title: Something About Art 2
